label: Taxon Concept
definition: The underlying meaning, or referential extension, of a scientific name  as  stated by a particular author in a particular publication. It represents the  author's full-blown view of how the name reaches out to observed or  unobserved objects in nature (beyond statements about type specimens). It is  a direct reflection of what has been written, illustrated, and deposited by  a taxonomist, regardless of his or her theoretical orientation (Franz & Peet  2009).

label: Taxon Concept Category
definition: The category of Taxon Concept

label: Taxon Name
definition: The Taxon Name for this Taxonomic Name Usage

label: According To
definition: Reference to the source of this concept, which uses the Taxon Name in this sense (i.e. secundum, sensu).

label: According To String
definition: String representation of accordingTo

label: Parent
definition: The direct, most proximate higher-rank parent (in a classification).

label: Synonym
definition: Name considered to apply to the same taxon as the accepted name (taxonName)

label: Vernacular Name
definition: Common or vernacular name, used as an alternative to the taxonomic name.
notes: A name is only a vernacular name if it is used as an alternative to another name.

label: Character Circumscription
definition: A set of taxonomic descriptions used to define this concept. May potentially hold descriptions according to the TDWG SDD schema, or any other, format.

label: Specimen Circumscription
definition: A set of specimens that are used to define the concept.

label: Taxon Relationship
definition: Assertion of a relationship between two taxa

label: Relationship type
definition: The type of relationship that is asserted.

label: Subject Taxon Concept
definition: The subject Taxon Concept in this relationship.

label: Object Taxon Concept
definition: The object or target Taxon Concept in this relationship.

label: Relationship According To
definition: Reference for the taxon relationship assertion

label: Taxon Name
definition: A name used as a label for a taxon or taxonomic group.

label: Taxon Name String
definition: The complete uninomial, binomial or trinomial name without any authority or  year components.

label: Uninomial
definition: Single-word name string for a name of generic or higher rank
usage: This property should be used for any single word names. These include  family, genus, infrafamilial, and suprafamilial names. Note that this  property should be used for generic names. The genus property should only  be used for names below rank of genus.

label: Taxon Name Authorship
definition: The full code-appropriate authorship string for the Taxon Name.

label: Combination Authorship
definition: The full code-appropriate authorship string for the Taxon Name.

label: Basionym Authorship
definition: Authorship of the basionym
usage: Note that the basionym is another name (Taxon Name) and that names cannot be their own basionym. The basionym authorship is always in parentheses in  both botanical and zoological names.

label: Name Published In
definition: Publication where the taxonomic name was first published.

label: Microreference
definition: Specifies any minor reference parts, e.g. page number.
usage: Refers to precise location within a larger work.

label: Nomenclatural Code
definition: Nomenclatural code that applies to the group of organisms the taxonomic name  is for.

label: Nomenclatural Status
definition: Status related to the original publication of the name and its conformance to the relevant rules of nomenclature.

label: Basionym
definition: Original name on which the present name is based.

label: Replaced Name
definition: Name for which this name is a replacement

label: Based On
definition: Invalidly published or illegitimate name for which this name is the  validation.

label: Conserved Against
definition: Name(s) against which this name is conserved

label: Sanctioned By
definition: Reference to the work in which this name was sanctioned.
notes: This is a reference to a publication, not a person.

label: Nomenclatural Type
definition: Element to which `TaxonName` permanently attached
notes: One or more `NomenclaturalType`s make up the typification of a `TaxonName`.

label: Typified Name
definition: The `TaxonName` for which this is `NomenclaturalType`

label: Type of Type
definition: The kind of type this specimen is e.g. paratype, isotype, holotype etc.

label: Type Name
definition: The name that is the type.
notes: TaxonNames at ranks above species level are typified by the name of a lower taxon. Ultimately, by following the chain of type names, all names resolve  to a type species and so a type specimen.

label: Type Specimen
definition: The specimen that is the type.
usage: TaxonNames at ranks of family and below are typified by a specimen. This property is mutually exclusive with typeName.

label: Type Published In
definition: Publication where the type was nominated
usage: This is relevant for `lectotype`, `neotype`, `epitype` and conserved types. For other types of type the publication where the type is nominated is the  publication where the name was published.
